name: Another Realm
description:
Set in a fantasy world, you take on the role Jimmy. Your brother has gone missing in the months prior to current events. A young hunter, you set out from your town on a boat, when things take a sudden catastrophic turn by unknown forces to you.

You awaken at the shores of a land far from home, your boat completely wrecked, not knowing how you got there. Your only option is to find civilization and hope to find a way home. Not all is as it seems, as you (Jimmy) will soon find out!

Enter the world of Timeland...

The game takes inspiration from modern day issues, whilst being portrayed in an older styled setting.

The current demo will take you up to the 2nd small town in the game.
